detectors.description:
VELOStakingPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VELOStakingPool.sol#736-758) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(duration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VELOStakingPool.sol#743)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VELOStakingPool.sol#746)
